description: Haupt-exponents of 3 modulo integers relatively prime to 3.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Multiplicative Order
maple: A001651 := proc(n)        (3*(2*n-1)-(-1)^n)/4 ;end proc:A050975 := proc(n)        local gcd3 ;        gcd3 := A001651(n+1);        numtheory[order](3,gcd3) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 21 2012
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
